[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1472482936720{margin-top: 80px !important;margin-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”wide-box-mobile”][vc_custom_heading text=”Welcome to” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:20px|text_align:left|color:%23000000″ google_fonts=”font_family:Abril%20Fatface%3Aregular” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_custom_heading text=”Digital Consulting Pandit” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:32px|text_align:left|color:__USE_THEME_MAIN_COLOR__” google_fonts=”font_family:Abril%20Fatface%3Aregular” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_column_text]

Digital Consulting Pandit is a Digital marketing agency in Mumbai established in 2015 and within this period we have served 100+ clients across the Globe. With the ‘Mind’ of a ‘Consultancy’ and the ‘Heart’ of an ‘Agency’, we believe in delivering results to our client. Technology is our core strength and marketing has always been our forte.

In a span of 6 years, we have consulted more than 20 companies, provided Digital Marketing & Corporate branding services to 100+ clients and trained 1000+ Students/ Entrepreneurs to build their own marketing strategies and succeed in their area of excellence.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”wide-box-mobile”]

[rev_slider_vc alias=”home-small-slider”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator color=”black”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1589277034152{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_single_image image=”10009″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Creative Head” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:20px|text_align:left|color:%23000000″ google_fonts=”font_family:Abril%20Fatface%3Aregular” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_custom_heading text=”Mr. Pranav Kotak” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:32px|text_align:left|color:__USE_THEME_MAIN_COLOR__” google_fonts=”font_family:Abril%20Fatface%3Aregular” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]

– Total IT experience primarily with 2 giant IT companies (Infosys & TCS).
– Visiting Faculty & Project mentor at Indian Institute of Management Studies (IIMs-Kolkata).
– Member of Academic Council at FMS-IRM, Jaipur (ranked A+++ among India’s top B-Schools).

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30px”]

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1589277034152{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_single_image image=”11495″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Business Consultant” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:20px|text_align:left|color:%23000000″ google_fonts=”font_family:Abril%20Fatface%3Aregular” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_custom_heading text=”Mr. Vimal Gosar” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:32px|text_align:left|color:__USE_THEME_MAIN_COLOR__” google_fonts=”font_family:Abril%20Fatface%3Aregular” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]

– PMP Certified Project Manager since 2013
– CBAP Certified Business Analyst since 2018
– Specialized in Building Business case, strategy Analysis and designing solutions.
– Prior experience in Data Migration, System Integration and Remediation projects across various industry domains.
– Plays key role in stakeholder management, requirement management and solution evaluation process.
– IIBA Sydney chapter member and volunteer.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30px”]

[vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Vision” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_custom_heading text=”Our vision is to become a leading agency offering online marketing strategies, digital solutions & internet brand management within the international business sphere. Set a new standard of quality and work ethic in the online marketing industry.” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:16px|text_align:center|color:%23f9f9f9|line_height:25px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]
[vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Mission” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_custom_heading text=”Our ultimate mission is to deliver outstanding digital marketing services to all sizes of businesses and in any industry and become a high-performance creative agency that enables brands to reach out to their audience & deliver results. We measure our success by the success of our clients.” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:16px|text_align:center|color:%23f9f9f9|line_height:25px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator color=”black”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1594384881316{margin-top: 80px !important;margin-bottom: 50px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;}” el_id=”our-values-id”][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”wide-box-mobile”][vc_custom_heading text=”Our” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:56px|text_align:left|line_height:50px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”nexa-bold values”][vc_custom_heading text=”Core” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:56px|text_align:left|color:__USE_THEME_MAIN_COLOR__|line_height:40px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”nexa-bold values”][vc_custom_heading text=”Values” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:56px|text_align:left|line_height:40px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”nexa-bold values”][vc_column_text]

Our Core Values

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]Our high-performance growth culture is run by adopting our values that shows what we do when we are at our best.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″ el_class=”wide-box-mobile”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1463177866784{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Service Delivery

We put our client first
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Team Work

We believe in team work
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1463177888816{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Innovation

We’re setting the bar for digital marketing and standing out from the crowd!
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Excellence

We deliver what we promise and add unexpected value to our clients’ businesses
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner]

Result

Focus on results that truly matter to the client. The bottom line is always top-of-mind
